staff.name: Brian Cisto
staff.bio: I am currently a junior majoring in CS with a dual degree in Math. In the realm of computer science, I enjoy delving into how CS can be applied to interdisciplinary fields including biomedical engineering and computational biochemistry. Apart from studying, I enjoy losing track of time in nature, swimming, working out, and playing random riffs on guitar.

staff.name: Lily
staff.bio: Lily Liu is a sophomore studying CS + Statistics at UIUC, originally from Aurora, IL. On campus, she's involved with CS SAIL, Women in Statistics, and the Alpha Omega Epsilon Engineering Sorority. Passionate about artificial intelligence, Lily previously conducted machine learning research on non-invasive endometriosis diagnosis through UCSF AI4ALL, where she also served as a Teaching Assistant mentoring students in AI projects. Beyond academics, advocates for women and nonbinary students in STEM and loves to spend a lot of time with friends and family.
